skillTree.localised_description: As a shadow of vengeance rides the Sword of Solkan through the dark streets of Marienburg, some say his horse Phantom is the vengeful image of Solkan himself.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: He who is blessed by the God of Law fears only his wrathful gaze
Acting from the shadows, the agents of Solkan are the eyes and ears of the cult. Secretly operating throughout the entire Empire in their crusade against evil.
The Sword of Solkan relies on intelligence provided by the Black Caps, as the night's watch secretly shares their assumptions when they suspect the worship of Chaos.

Not one living soul knows the true identity of the Sword of Solkan, but many speculate he must be a member of one of the most influential families. Perhaps even the most influential one. As he permits himself access to places unaccessable to others.

effects.description: Ability: "Guardian" while embedded in Van de Kuyper's army

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: As Solkan's agent calls out the heretic, he inflicts the retribution of the Gods of Law on those who offend them. The eyesless gaze of Solkan fixed on the transgressor.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: One of Solkan's symbols is the golden fist. Displaying both Solkan's wrathful and pure nature.

The Liber Flamma Purgatio is a vital relic among the Cult of Solkan's acolytes. It is said to hold secrets instrumental in the fight against chaos, and many of chaos cultist has attempted to snatch it from the cult's watchful gaze.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Anonymous yet extremely wealthy sponsors enable the Sword to perform his actions. His sponsors count themselves true Marienburger aristocrats. Rooting for his cause.

The Order of the Shattered Amulet is a minor order part of the cult of Solkan, they are devote to restoring the most profound artifact of Solkan's lore, his amulet. Their quest has lead them to the Wasteland for reasons unknown.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 or Knights of the Cleansing Flame (Empire Knights)
	(Hero's army)
Capacity: +2 for Knights of the Cleansing Flame (Empire Knights)

skillTree.localised_description: Not only extremely skilled with his greatsword, the Sword of Solkan fights with a certain uncanning determination, giving him the edge against many of foe.
None can outrun Solkan's judgement, as in time all shall fall under his merciless gaze. Fleeing is only postponing the inevatible.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: Said to be blessed by Solkan the Avenger himself, the one worthy to wield this greatswords carries a great power, with a great responsiblity.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

items.colour_text: The Sword of Solkan's magical ring allows him to adapt many forms, further augmenting his natural disguise abilities.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Creates an illusion of the Sword of Solkan

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

items.colour_text: Theophilus Graveland came to Marienburg from Kalkaat, a town in Kleinland. He started his career as a bounty hunter, tracking smugglers and pirates who preyed on river traffic. Not because he cared, but because tracking and hunting other people was the only thing he was good at. Almost all his travels led to Marienburg, and to Suiddock. In the time he spent hunting criminals there, he came to know its people and found among them and their vitality something he lacked - something to care about and protect for its own sake, not just for the reward money. And so he became a member of the Black Caps, taking promotions only when they allowed him to stay in Suiddock. He was finally promoted to Watch Captain a few years ago, and has been tireless in guarding the docklands and its people.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Black Caps (Goedendagers)
	(Hero's army)

Melee Defence: +8 for Black Caps (Goedendagers)
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Of the Cult of Solkan is the Sword that battles Chaos, The Sword of Solkan is it's sharpest tip.

effects.description: Ward save: 10% when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos
